thread.title: Westman teams miss playoffs at MCT event
thread.title_full: Westman teams miss playoffs at MCT event

title: Westman teams miss playoffs at MCT event
text:
Westman teams miss playoffs at MCT event By: Uncredited Report Error 
None of Westman’s teams had the weekend they hoped for at the Manitoba Curling Tour’s KKP Classic in Winnipeg. 
Curtis McCannell of Pilot Mound, Kelly Marnoch of Carberry and Carberry native and reigning world junior champion Braden Calvert all went 1-3 in their respective pools and missed the playoffs. Steen Sigurdson, who has Calvert’s brother Trevor at third, also went 1-3. 
Winnipeg’s Daley Peters beat Stonewall’s Jared Kolomaya 5-3 in the final.
